rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0001
rows.name: Yo, if it isn't Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0002
rows.name: Lao. It's been a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah, you've got someone I haven't seen with you.
What happened to Danny and Boris?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
They're new team members.
As for Danny and Boris[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0005
rows.name:
We encountered a tough native creature.
I couldn't save them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Is that right? Sorry.
Guess I asked something I shouldn't have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0007
rows.name: It's okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Anyway, what's that round thing?
Emergency rations or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0009
rows.name: N-Not emergency rations, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Tatsu is Nopon, a legendary race of proper lineage,
who have lived on this planet since ancient times, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
I-It talks?
Where'd you pick this thing up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
We rescued him when he was about to be turned into food
by aliens called the Bias.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0013
rows.name:
He's accompanying us
as a guide for this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0014
rows.name: I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0015
rows.name: And you, are you really as young as you look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Yep! 13 years old, outside and in.
I'm Lin Lee Kuu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0017
rows.name:
I see. Joining Elma's team at 13...
you must be talented.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0018
rows.name: And you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Favorable Impression

rows.label: xs04050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Turn back to Lao and give your name.

rows.label: xs04050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Antipathy

rows.label: xs04050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Cross arms and prompt him to introduce himself first.

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Affiliated with Pathfinder, leader of Team Belisarda.
I'm Lao. Nice to meet ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Seems like someone with backbone.
Ah well, whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0021
rows.name:
A strange bunch, but
they seem pretty capable, don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0022
rows.name: I chose them myself, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0023
rows.name: True.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0024
rows.name:
So, that story about Nelson's team
getting taken out by hostile aliens, is it true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Yes. Whether they are the forces that attacked Earth
or not, I don't know, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0026
rows.name: They possessed a pretty advanced technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0027
rows.name: I see. We'll both have to be careful then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0028
rows.name:
By the way, there was a Life Point-like reading
in Nightglow Forest. Have you found anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0029
rows.name: What? Around here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0030
rows.name: I take it the answer is no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0031
rows.name: Yeah, first time hearing it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0031_2
rows.name:
We met other teams, too, but
that didn't come up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0032
rows.name: I see. Too bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0033
rows.name:
I was hoping your team might have found
some information, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Thanks.
Well, we'll be going then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Hold on a sec!
Mind if I tag along too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0036
rows.name: Aren't you in the middle of a mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0037
rows.name: It's pretty much done. Just need to report back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0038
rows.name: No way. Reporting is part of the mission, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0039
rows.name:
Minor details like that?
I'll leave it to my more talented team members.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0040
rows.name:
More important is the Life!
I haven't seen the Life yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0041
rows.name:
In this situation, where you don't know
when a native creature might get you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0042
rows.name:
I should get a chance to see it just once, right?
Please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04050100_MSG0043
rows.name: What a pain.[ST:wait ]
